alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 21 at 10:38PM MST until April 22 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM MST FRIDAY THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph, with gusts from 60 to 65 mph. Locally higher gusts near Springerville and Eagar. * WHERE...Locations in and near Window Rock, Ganado, Winslow, Holbrook, Snowflake, St. Johns, Springerville, Heber, Show Low, Greer, Pinetop, Dilkon, and Kykotsmovi. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. Areas of blowing dust and sand with reduced visibility at times.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
